attributes.action: protect democracy and human rights by establishing caretaker government in Bangladesh
attributes.additional_details:
Sheikh Hasina has changed the Bangladesh constitution and taken away the constitutional rights from general public by removing caretaker government system, if next general election is conducted under the control of present government the people of Bangladesh would not be able to vote freely to choose who and how the country should be run economically and maintain good relationship with rest of the world's democracy,
We would like to request the UK parliament to support and save our country's democracy as we are part of the Commonwealth country and developing  partner of UK, by discussing and suggest international rule's to establish caretaker government before the general election in Bangladesh,
as you may have already know that under present government hundreds of political opponents and journalist's are disappearing without a trace including MP's and many are being killed by Awami League activist's,
